forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 60. West wind around 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 9 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, a gentle warmth wraps the city as the sun casts its loyal gaze upon the skyline, with temperatures nudging close to sixty degrees. The western winds, playful and brisk, whistle through the streets at twenty-two miles per hour, bringing a refreshing touch that reminds you of the ocean's embrace. As the day progresses towards evening, the clouds will gather their strength, cloaking the sky with a veil of mystery, and the temperature will subtly drop to a soft fifty-two degrees, inviting you to layer up against the coolness. Gusts remain noticeable, maintaining a briskness that dances with the city’s pulse.

With this mix of sun and shadow, the air carries a promise of exploration. A stroll along the Embarcadero, perhaps, where the shimmering views of the Bay can still catch a glimmer of light before dusk. Or maybe, meander through the quiet nooks of Golden Gate Park, where the greenery offers a serene backdrop to unwind. Dressing in layers will serve you well today; a light sweater or jacket will accompany the sunshine and the later chill without weighing you down. As fog drapes around the Golden Gate, it hints at the marine layer’s persistent caress, reminding us of the city's ever-changing aura. In these moments, San Francisco reveals itself in rich hues of quiet beauty, perfect for savoring the simple joys of life.
